sent.orig: Fair resign the global tax profit and format the reasonable resign rules.
sent.trans: 公平分配全球电子商务中产生的税收利益，形成合理的国际税收权益分配秩序。

sent.orig: Convention dictates that our prime minister should resign in such a situation.
sent.trans: 依照常规我国首相在这种情况下应该辞职。

sent.orig: Samak resign and that Thailand switch to an appointed government, rather than a democratically elected one.
sent.trans: 他们要求沙马辞职，国家用任命形式指定政府，放弃民选政府的做法。

sent.orig: You can resign to your fate and learn gradually, which may sometimes bring you much pain.
sent.trans: 你可以只听天由命，慢慢地学，有时候或许会很痛苦。
